QuestData.Title: A Heartfelt Search
QuestData.Description: I can feel a powerful presence in the marsh $p, it is not far from here.$b$bGo see what is there while I finish my grim feast. I will catch up...
QuestData.LogDescription: Investigate the strange presence in the Crimson Fen.
QuestData.RewardText: This is unfortunate... I had hoped... Still we are closer now, we are on the right track to finishing this.$b$bNone too soon either, the screaming beasts are really getting to me...
